member.summary: Internal SDK property not intended for public use.

member.name: F:Microsoft.AppCenter.Crashes.Crashes._crashesInitializationDelegate
member.summary: We keep the reference to avoid it being freed, inlining this object will cause listeners not to be called.

member.summary: We keep the reference to avoid it being freed, inlining this object will cause listeners not to be called.

member.name: F:Microsoft.AppCenter.Crashes.Crashes.LogTag
member.summary: Log tag used by the Crashes component.

member.name: E:Microsoft.AppCenter.Crashes.Crashes.SendingErrorReport
member.summary: Occurs when an error report is about to be sent.

member.name: E:Microsoft.AppCenter.Crashes.Crashes.SentErrorReport
member.summary: Occurs when an error report has been successfully sent.

member.name: E:Microsoft.AppCenter.Crashes.Crashes.FailedToSendErrorReport
member.summary: Occurs when an error report has failed to be sent.

member.name: F:Microsoft.AppCenter.Crashes.Crashes.ShouldProcessErrorReport
member.summary: Set this callback to add custom behavior for determining whether an error report should be processed. Returning false prevents the crash from being reported to the server.

member.name: F:Microsoft.AppCenter.Crashes.Crashes.ShouldAwaitUserConfirmation
member.summary: Set this callback to add custom behavior for determining whether user confirmation is required to send error reports.

member.name: F:Microsoft.AppCenter.Crashes.Crashes.GetErrorAttachments
member.summary: Set this callback to attach custom text and/or binaries to an error report.

member.name: M:Microsoft.AppCenter.Crashes.Crashes.NotifyUserConfirmation(Microsoft.AppCenter.Crashes.UserConfirmation)
member.summary: Notifies SDK with a confirmation to handle the crash report.

member.name: M:Microsoft.AppCenter.Crashes.Crashes.IsEnabledAsync
member.summary: Check whether the Crashes service is enabled or not.
member.returns: A task with result being true if enabled, false if disabled.

member.name: M:Microsoft.AppCenter.Crashes.Crashes.SetEnabledAsync(System.Boolean)
member.summary: Enable or disable the Crashes service.
member.returns: A task to monitor the operation.

member.name: M:Microsoft.AppCenter.Crashes.Crashes.HasCrashedInLastSessionAsync
member.summary: Provides information whether the app crashed in its last session.
member.value: Task with result being true if a crash was recorded in the last session, otherwise false.

member.name: M:Microsoft.AppCenter.Crashes.Crashes.GetLastSessionCrashReportAsync
member.summary: Gets the crash report generated in the last session if there was a crash.
member.value: Crash report from the last session, null if there was no crash in the last session.

member.name: M:Microsoft.AppCenter.Crashes.Crashes.HasReceivedMemoryWarningInLastSessionAsync
member.summary: Provides information whether the app received memory warning in its last session.
member.value: Task with result being true if a memory warning was recorded in the last session, otherwise false

member.name: M:Microsoft.AppCenter.Crashes.Crashes.GenerateTestCrash
member.summary: Generates crash for testing purposes.
member.remarks: This call has no effect in non debug configuration (such as release).

member.summary: Track a handled error.
member.param: The .NET exception describing the handled error.

member.name: T:Microsoft.AppCenter.Crashes.ErrorAttachmentLog
member.summary: Error attachment for error report.

member.summary: Builds an attachment with text suitable for using in .

member.param: Text to attach to the error report.
File name to use on reports.

member.summary: Builds an attachment with binary suitable for using in .
member.returns: Error attachment or null if null data is passed.
member.param: File name to use on reports.

member.name: T:Microsoft.AppCenter.Crashes.ErrorReport
member.summary: Error report containing information about a particular crash.

member.summary: Gets the report identifier.
member.value: UUID for the report.

member.summary: Gets the app start time.
member.value: Date and time the app started

member.summary: Gets the app error time.
member.value: Date and time the error occured

member.name: P:Microsoft.AppCenter.Crashes.ErrorReport.Device
member.summary: Gets the device that the crashed app was being run on.

member.summary: Gets the C# Exception object that caused the crash.

member.name: P:Microsoft.AppCenter.Crashes.ErrorReport.StackTrace
member.summary: Gets the C# exception stack trace captured at crash time.
member.value: The exception.

member.name: P:Microsoft.AppCenter.Crashes.ErrorReport.AndroidDetails
member.summary: Gets details specific to Android.
member.value: Android error report details. null if the OS is not Android.

member.name: P:Microsoft.AppCenter.Crashes.ErrorReport.iOSDetails
member.summary: Gets details specific to iOS.

member.summary: Error report details pertinent only to devices running Android.

member.summary: Gets the throwable associated with the Java crash.

member.summary: Gets the stack trace associated with the Java crash.

member.summary: Gets the name of the thread that crashed.
member.value: The name of the thread that crashed.

member.summary: Error report details pertinent only to devices running iOS.

member.summary: Gets the reporter key.
member.value: UUID for the app installation on the device.

member.name: P:Microsoft.AppCenter.Crashes.iOSErrorDetails.Signal
member.summary: Gets the signal that caused the crash.
member.value: The signal that caused the crash.

member.name: P:Microsoft.AppCenter.Crashes.iOSErrorDetails.ExceptionName
member.summary: Gets the name of the exception that triggered the crash, null if the crash was not triggered by an exception.
member.value: The name of the exception that triggered the crash.

member.name: P:Microsoft.AppCenter.Crashes.iOSErrorDetails.ExceptionReason
member.summary: Gets the reason for the exception that triggered the crash, null if the crash was not triggered by an exception.
member.value: The reason for the exception causing the crash.

member.name: P:Microsoft.AppCenter.Crashes.iOSErrorDetails.AppProcessIdentifier
member.summary: Gets the identifier of the app process that crashed.
